title: Washington reusable rocket startup Stoke Space raises $100 million
summary: Washington-based startup Stoke Space raised $100 million in new funds, the company announced Thursday, as it aims to develop a fully reusable rocket called “Nova.”

title: India hopes reforms will make it a global space hub
summary: The Indian government is continuing a series of reforms aimed at increasing private involvement in the space sector and attracting global capital.

title: Investing in Space: Trust NASA’s private orbital station development process
summary: “Refining strategies and evolving partnerships are part of the process.”

title: Space Force releases final call for bids for national security launch services
summary: The U.S. Space Force on Oct. 4 released two solicitations for the next round of national security launch contracts, known as National Security Space Launch Phase 3.

title: Russia blames Luna-25 crash on computer glitch
summary: Russia says its first lunar lander mission in nearly half a century crashed in August because of faulty commands in an onboard computer during a maneuver.
